query:
-- تحديث إجمالي البونص في weeklyBonuses
UPDATE weeklyBonuses wb
SET totalAmount = (
  SELECT COALESCE(SUM(CAST(bd.bonusAmount AS DECIMAL(15,2))), 0)
  FROM bonusDetails bd
  WHERE bd.weeklyBonusId = wb.id
),
updatedAt = NOW();
